languages.text:
Чтобы экипировать новое оружие и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g}, откройте инвентарь через сервисное меню, выберите предмет с помощью {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, нажмите {console_bind|Func01} и выберите пункт "Экипировать". Или выберите слот, в котором вы хотите заменить предмет, нажмите {console_bind|Confirm} и выберите предмет из списка.
Чтобы посмотреть характеристики предмета, выберите предмет и нажмите {console_bind|RightStickButton}. Вы можете подробнее изучить описание, удерживая {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

traits.locale_text:
Чтобы экипировать новое оружие и броню, откройте Инвентарь через сервисное меню, выберите предмет с помощью { console_bind | DPad}/{ console_bind | LeftStick}, нажмите { console_bind | Func01} и выберите пункт "Экипировать". Или выберите слот, в который в котором вы хотите изменить предмет, нажмите { console_bind | Confirm} и выберите предмет из списка.
Чтобы посмотреть характеристики предмета, выберите предмет и нажмите { console_bind | RightStickButton}. Вы можете подробней изучить описание, удерживая { console_bind | RightStickButton}

languages.text:
To equip new weapons or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, open your inventory from quick access, select the item using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, press {console_bind|Func01}, and then select Equip. Alternatively, you can choose an equipment slot that contains gear you would like to replace, press {console_bind|Confirm}, then select an item from the list.
To view the parameters of an item, select it and press {console_bind|RightStickButton}. You can learn even more about the item by holding {console_bind|RightStickButton}.
languages.original_text:
Чтобы экипировать новое оружие и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g}, откройте инвентарь через сервисное меню, выберите предмет с помощью {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, нажмите {console_bind|Func01} и выберите пункт "Экипировать". Или выберите слот, в котором вы хотите заменить предмет, нажмите {console_bind|Confirm} и выберите предмет из списка.
Чтобы посмотреть характеристики предмета, выберите предмет и нажмите {console_bind|RightStickButton}. Вы можете подробнее изучить описание, удерживая {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

traits.locale_text:
To equip a new weapon or armour, open your inventory from quick access, select the item using {console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, press {console_bind|Func01}, then select Equip. Alternatively, you can choose an equipment slot that contains gear you would like to replace, press {console_bind|Confirm}, then select an item from the list.
To view the parameters of an item, select it and press {console_bind|RightStickButton}. You can learn even more about the item by holding {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

To equip new weapons or armour, open your inventory from quick access, select the item using {console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, press {console_bind|Func01}, and then select Equip. Alternatively, you can choose an equipment slot that contains gear you would like to replace, press {console_bind|Confirm}, then select an item from the list.
To view the parameters of an item, select it and press {console_bind|RightStickButton}. You can learn even more about the item by holding {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

To equip new weapons or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, open your inventory from quick access, select the item using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, press {console_bind|Func01}, and then select Equip. Alternatively, you can choose an equipment slot that contains gear you would like to replace, press {console_bind|Confirm}, then select an item from the list.
To view the parameters of an item, select it and press {console_bind|RightStickButton}. You can learn even more about the item by holding {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

To equip new weapons or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, open your inventory from quick access, select the item using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, press {console_bind|Func01}, and then select Equip. Alternatively, you can choose an equipment slot that contains gear you would like to replace, press {console_bind|Confirm}, then select an item from the list.
To view the parameters of an item, select it and press {console_bind|RightStickButton}. You can learn even more about the item by holding {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

languages.text:
Para equipar armas o {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armaduras{/g} nuevas, abre el inventario desde el acceso rápido, elige el objeto con {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, pulsa {console_bind|Func01} y selecciona Equipar. Como alternativa, también puedes elegir la ranura de equipamiento que contenga la pieza que quiera reemplazar, pulsar {console_bind|Confirm} y elegir un objeto de la lista.
Para ver los parámetros de un objeto, selecciónalo y pulsa {console_bind|RightStickButton}. Puedes saber más acerca del objeto manteniendo {console_bind|RightStickButton}.
languages.original_text:
To equip new weapons or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, open your inventory from quick access, select the item using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, press {console_bind|Func01}, and then select Equip. Alternatively, you can choose an equipment slot that contains gear you would like to replace, press {console_bind|Confirm}, then select an item from the list.
To view the parameters of an item, select it and press {console_bind|RightStickButton}. You can learn even more about the item by holding {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

traits.locale_text:
Para equipar armas o {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armaduras{/g} nuevas, abre el inventario desde el acceso rápido, elige el objeto con {console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, pulsa {console_bind|Func01} y selecciona Equipar. Como alternativa, también puedes elegir la ranura de equipamiento que contenga la pieza que quiera reemplazar, pulsar {console_bind|Confirm} y elegir un objeto de la lista.
Para ver los parámetros de un objeto, selecciónalo y pulsa {console_bind|RightStickButton}. Puedes saber más acerca del objeto manteniendo {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

languages.text:
新しい武器や{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を装備するには、クイックアクセスからインベントリを開き、{console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}を使用してアイテムを選択し、{console_bind|Func01}を押して[装備]を選択する。または、交換したいギアが入っている装備スロットを選んで{console_bind|Confirm}を押し、リストからアイテムを選ぶこともできる。
アイテムのパラメータを表示するには、そのアイテムを選択して{console_bind|RightStickButton}を押す。アイテムについてさらに詳しい情報を知りたい場合は、{console_bind|RightStickButton}を長押しする。
languages.original_text:
To equip new weapons or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, open your inventory from quick access, select the item using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, press {console_bind|Func01}, and then select Equip. Alternatively, you can choose an equipment slot that contains gear you would like to replace, press {console_bind|Confirm}, then select an item from the list.
To view the parameters of an item, select it and press {console_bind|RightStickButton}. You can learn even more about the item by holding {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

traits.locale_text:
新しい武器や{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}を装備するには、クイックアクセスからインベントリを開き、{console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick}を使用してアイテムを選択し、{console_bind|Func01}を押して[装備]を選択する。または、交換したいギアが入っている装備スロットを選んで{console_bind|Confirm}を押し、リストからアイテムを選ぶこともできる。
アイテムのパラメータを表示するには、そのアイテムを選択して{console_bind|RightStickButton}を押す。アイテムについてさらに詳しい情報を知りたい場合は、{console_bind|RightStickButton}を長押しする。

languages.text:
若要装备新的武器或{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，可以通过快速访问菜单打开物品栏，按下{console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}选择物品，按下{console_bind|Func01}，之后选择“装备”。或者，您也可以选择需要更换装备的装备栏，按下{console_bind|Confirm}，之后从列表中选择需要装备的物品。
若想查看物品的属性，请选择要查看的物品，之后按下{console_bind|RightStickButton}。您还可以按住{console_bind|RightStickButton}，来了解更多关于物品的信息。
languages.original_text:
To equip new weapons or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, open your inventory from quick access, select the item using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, press {console_bind|Func01}, and then select Equip. Alternatively, you can choose an equipment slot that contains gear you would like to replace, press {console_bind|Confirm}, then select an item from the list.
To view the parameters of an item, select it and press {console_bind|RightStickButton}. You can learn even more about the item by holding {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

traits.locale_text:
若要装备新的{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}武器{/g}或护甲，可以通过快速访问菜单打开物品栏，按下{console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick}选择物品，按下{console_bind|Func01}，之后选择“装备”。或者，您也可以选择需要更换装备的装备栏，按下{console_bind|Confirm}，之后从列表中选择需要装备的物品。
若想查看物品的属性，请选择要查看的物品，之后按下{console_bind|RightStickButton}。您还可以按住{console_bind|RightStickButton}，来了解更多关于物品的信息。

languages.text: Um neue Waffen oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstungen{/g} auszurüsten, öffne dein Inventar über den Schnellzugriff, wähle den Gegenstand mit {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick} aus, drücke {console_bind|Func01} und wähle dann Ausrüsten. Alternativ kannst du den Ausrüstungsplatz auswählen, bei dem du die Ausrüstung ersetzen möchtest, {console_bind|Confirm} drücken und dann den Gegenstand aus der Liste auswählen. Um die Parameter eines Gegenstandes zu sehen, wähle ihn aus und drücke {console_bind|RightStickButton}. Du kannst noch mehr über den Gegenstand erfahren, indem du {console_bind|RightStickButton} gedrückt hältst.
languages.original_text:
To equip new weapons or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, open your inventory from quick access, select the item using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, press {console_bind|Func01}, and then select Equip. Alternatively, you can choose an equipment slot that contains gear you would like to replace, press {console_bind|Confirm}, then select an item from the list.
To view the parameters of an item, select it and press {console_bind|RightStickButton}. You can learn even more about the item by holding {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

traits.locale_text: Um neue Waffen oder {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstungen{/g} auszurüsten, öffne dein Inventar über den Schnellzugriff, wähle den Gegenstand mit {console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick} aus, drücke {console_bind|Func01} und wähle dann Ausrüsten. Alternativ kannst du den Ausrüstungsplatz auswählen, bei dem du die Ausrüstung ersetzen möchtest, {console_bind|Confirm} drücken und dann den Gegenstand aus der Liste auswählen. Um die Parameter eines Gegenstandes zu sehen, wähle ihn aus und drücke {console_bind|RightStickButton}. Du kannst noch mehr über den Gegenstand erfahren, indem du {console_bind|RightStickButton} gedrückt hältst.

languages.text:
Pour utiliser de nouvelles armes ou {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armures{/g}, ouvrez votre inventaire à partir de l'accès rapide, sélectionnez l'objet à l'aide de {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, appuyez sur {console_bind|Func01}, puis sélectionnez Ajouter à l'équipement. Vous pouvez également choisir un emplacement d'équipement contenant ce que vous souhaitez remplacer, appuyer sur {console_bind|Confirm}, puis sélectionner un objet dans la liste.
Pour afficher les paramètres d'un objet, sélectionnez-le et appuyez sur {console_bind|RightStickButton}. Pour en savoir plus sur cet objet, appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|RightStickButton}.
languages.original_text:
To equip new weapons or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, open your inventory from quick access, select the item using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, press {console_bind|Func01}, and then select Equip. Alternatively, you can choose an equipment slot that contains gear you would like to replace, press {console_bind|Confirm}, then select an item from the list.
To view the parameters of an item, select it and press {console_bind|RightStickButton}. You can learn even more about the item by holding {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

traits.locale_text:
Pour utiliser de nouvelles armes ou {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armures{/g}, ouvrez votre inventaire à partir de l'accès rapide, sélectionnez l'objet à l’aide de {console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, appuyez sur {console_bind|Func01}, puis sélectionnez Équiper. Vous pouvez également choisir un emplacement d’équipement contenant le matériel que vous souhaitez remplacer, appuyer sur {console_bind|Confirm}, puis sélectionner un objet dans la liste.
Pour afficher les paramètres d'un objet, sélectionnez-le et appuyez sur {console_bind|RightStickButton}. Pour en savoir plus sur cet objet, appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

languages.text:
Yeni bir silah veya {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} kuşanmak için hızlı erişimden envanterini aç, {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick} ile eşyayı seç, {console_bind|Func01} düğmesine bas ve Kuşan komutunu seç. Alternatif olarak önce değiştirmek istediğin teçhizatı barındıran ekipman yuvasını seçip {console_bind|Confirm} düğmesine basabilir, ardından da listeden ilgili eşyayı seçebilirsin.
Bir eşyanın parametrelerini görüntülemek için, o eşyayı seç ve {console_bind|RightStickButton} düğmesine bas. {console_bind|RightStickButton} düğmesini basılı tutarak o eşya hakkında daha fazla bilgi edinebilirsin.
languages.original_text:
To equip new weapons or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, open your inventory from quick access, select the item using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, press {console_bind|Func01}, and then select Equip. Alternatively, you can choose an equipment slot that contains gear you would like to replace, press {console_bind|Confirm}, then select an item from the list.
To view the parameters of an item, select it and press {console_bind|RightStickButton}. You can learn even more about the item by holding {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

traits.locale_text:
Yeni bir silah veya {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} kuşanmak için hızlı erişimden envanterini aç, {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick} ile eşyayı seç, {console_bind|Func01} düğmesine bas ve Kuşan komutunu seç. Alternatif olarak, önce değiştirmek istediğin teçhizatı barındıran ekipman yuvasını, ardından da listeden ilgili eşyayı seçebilirsin.
Bir eşyanın parametrelerini görüntülemek için, o eşyayı seç ve {console_bind|RightStickButton} düğmesine bas. {console_bind|RightStickButton} düğmesini basılı tutarak o eşya hakkında daha fazla bilgi edinebilirsin.
